This is propably an old question:

Given two URIs 

http://www.example.org/foo#moo1
http://www.example.org/foo#moo2

do they identify the same resource or not?

Since the origin server will never see the fragments, it will apply the
same mapping (resource) when processing a request on either one of them.

Jan
